Name: Posibility
About the game: Is this a simple little game? You need to play as a monster, gain the opponent's ability through battle, improve your attributes, remove various obstacles, and finally defeat the leader. It is better to eat without watching the strategy! !! Basic operation: '0000': Start a new game '0001': Continue the game '9999': Exit the game 'W': Move up (available for some characters) 'A': move left 'S': move down (available for some characters) 'D': move right 'J': Attack (automatically used by some characters) 'K': Jump (some characters are unavailable) 'I': View transformation list '1'-'5': turn into a shortcut
Meta Title: Posibility: Dec 12, 2019, UGtobest and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Posibility? Check out the release date (Dec 12, 2019), developer insights from UGtobest, and a complete game summary.
